reference.title: hasNarrower
reference.shortdesc: Specifies that the contained hierarchy indicates a general-purpose, NARROWER-THAN relationship between subjects.

section.title: Description
section.p: Within the hierarchy, the child subject is narrower than the parent subject, but the way in which it is narrower isn't specified. For example, planting roses is a narrower subject than horticulture. See also http://www.w3.org/TR/swbp-skos-core-guide/#sechierarchy.
